title: Can't remake when your teammate has biscuit!
body: Looks like the remake system still has some flaw that it is ridiculous that we cannot remake at all just because he has a biscuit. And i just lost some points because of it.

replies.body: While there are instances where remake fails for varying reasons, I don't think biscuit has anything to do with it given you don't get ut until 3 minutes. It probably failed for another reason, but either way, your best bet is to submit a bug report (bottom right of the client). The more data they have on games where remakes are failing, the more reliable they can make it.
Plus our hecarim didn't even reconnect at all and stayed at the fountain the whole time.
